channel.title: Chavs Arent All Bad
channel.description:
I Myself am a self confessed chav, although i can speak in proper english and act in a decent manner when needed, i wanted to invite you to listen to 'my' kind of music which basically consists of Gabber,Hardcore,Dance,Techno etc.. just have a listen im sure some of you people will appreciate it.
Also Please feel free to send or guide me to kinds of music you like as i listen to everything really...
P.S My first post :D
Catchyehz

NO ONE ANSWERED ME. WTF IS A CHAV.

ever heard of a little thing they call… www.urbandictionary.com

[/quote]

He has already been answered you porch monkey.

REal chavs suck. Anyone ever been to Doncaster UK?

http://www.myspace.com/mcdevvo

^thats doncasters number one chav, he tours the country just beign a chav, ive seen him in a local club. check out his songs.

Rat’s piss the links broken, ill fix it later.[/quote]

HAHAHA That Bob Marley one samples waytoomany.com, the video with the stoned jamacan tourguide…

EDIT: Or possibly on second thoughts the song has that cracked out laugh in it also.

item.title: Chavs Arent All Bad
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

[quote=“apzrman, post:14, topic:64226”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=93084.msg982759#msg982759 date=1173310144]

Oh. We have things like them in australia. There called lads. Bad language favourites words are eshays, wot, cunt and brah. Usually do graffiti and have a sporty look on them. Nike shoes nautica/polo clothing.

lads… im thinking what a stupid name, but to you chav must sound stupid too.

[/quote]
i don’t remember calleing aus chavs lads…[/quote]

Well there diffrent. But there kind of the equvilant here. They only really exist in sydney

Read full topic

item.title: Chavs Arent All Bad
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

ian haich:

although i can speak in proper english and act in a decent manner when needed,

Then you are not a chav. That is not what chav means. All chavs ARE bad, because… that’s what the name describes.
It’s a bit like saying “not all assholes are bad, I’m an asshole!”.

Anyway, I listen to a lot of Electronic stuff too, you’ll find most around these parts are into metal and emo shite though
What sorta artists you into? Gimme some naammmez.

Oh yeah, I’m a music whore, so be warned I might tell you what I think about your music in graphic detail

Read full topic
